title: Ticket #3253: vm-gahp's systemCommand() handles privileges poorly
description: When the vm-gahp uses systemCommand() to run the script for interacting with VMware, privilege-handing is a little sloppy. In some error cases, it doesn't restore the original priv-state before returning. And when it decides to run the script as user Condor, it sets the priv-state to PRIV_UNKNOWN afterwards.
